A girl has challenged Shubham that if he can solve the sequence she will go on a date with him. Help Shubham so that he can go on his first date else like every other year this year also he would have to spend Valentine’s Day alone. He has to find N'th term of this sequence.
2, 4, 11, 36, 147, 778 ... ... ... ... Nth term. 

Input
Only one natural number  N.

Output
One natural number. N'th term of the sequence.

Constraints

7 ≤ N ≤ 20


Example
Input:
10

Output:
3629814

Problem Setter: Shubham Gupta
